element.name: T1 nerve
element.modality: flexor motor, extensor motor, general sensory

element.name: T1 nerve, dorsal root
element.branches: divides into medial and lateral branches
element.distribution: medial - muscular semispinalis thoracis and multifidus, cutaneous medial part of posterior aspect of T1 dermatome; lateral - muscular longissimus thoracis and iliocostalis thoracis, cutaneous lateral part of the T1 dermatome

element.name: T1 nerve, ventral root
element.distribution: large - brachial plexus; small - first intercostal nerve

element.name: upper thoracic nerves
element.modality: flexor motor, extensor motor, general sensory
element.action: parietes of the thorax; trunk flexor (rectus abdominis, intercostals)
